content.query:
CREATE VIEW catalog_sales
AS
SELECT 
ISNULL(CAST(_col0_ AS int), -1) AS cs_sold_date_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col1_ AS int), -1) AS cs_sold_time_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col2_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_date_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col3_ AS int), -1) AS cs_build_customer_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col4_ AS int), -1) AS cs_bill_cdemo_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col5_ AS int), -1) AS cs_bill_hdemo_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col6_ AS int), -1) AS cs_bill_addr_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col7_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_customer_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col8_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_cdemo_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col9_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_hdemo_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col10_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_addr_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col11_ AS int), -1) AS cs_call_center_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col12_ AS int), -1) AS cs_catalog_page_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col13_ AS int), -1) AS cs_ship_mode_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col14_ AS int), -1) AS cs_warehouse_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col15_ AS int), -1) AS cs_item_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col16_ AS int), -1) AS cs_promo_sk,
ISNULL(CAST(_col17_ AS BIGINT), -1) AS cs_order_number,
ISNULL(CAST(_col18_ AS int), -1) AS cs_quantity,
ISNULL(CAST(_col19_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_wholesale_cost,
ISNULL(CAST(_col20_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_list_price,
ISNULL(CAST(_col21_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_sales_price,
ISNULL(CAST(_col22_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_discount_amt,
ISNULL(CAST(_col23_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_sales_price,
ISNULL(CAST(_col24_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_wholesale_cost,
ISNULL(CAST(_col25_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_list_price,
ISNULL(CAST(_col26_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_tax,
ISNULL(CAST(_col27_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_coupon_amt,
ISNULL(CAST(_col28_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_ext_ship_cost,
ISNULL(CAST(_col29_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_net_paid,
ISNULL(CAST(_col30_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_net_paid_inc_tax,
ISNULL(CAST(_col31_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_net_paid_inc_ship,
ISNULL(CAST(_col32_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_net_paid_inc_ship_tax,
ISNULL(CAST(_col33_ AS Decimal(7,2)), -1) AS cs_net_profit

FROM OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'catalog_sales',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'insiderrsc',
    FORMAT = 'delta'
) --as rows;
WITH
(
mycol varchar(255),
_col0_ varchar(50),
_col1_ varchar(50),
_col2_ varchar(50),
_col3_ varchar(50),
_col4_ varchar(50),
_col5_ varchar(50),
_col6_ varchar(50),
_col7_ varchar(50),
_col8_ varchar(50),
_col9_ varchar(50),
_col10_ varchar(50),
_col11_ varchar(50),
_col12_ varchar(50),
_col13_ varchar(50),
_col14_ varchar(50),
_col15_ varchar(50),
_col16_ varchar(50),
_col17_ varchar(50), --Bigint
_col18_ varchar(50),
_col19_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col20_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col21_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col22_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col23_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col24_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col25_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col26_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col27_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col28_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col29_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col30_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col31_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col32_ varchar(50), --Decimal(7,2)
_col33_ varchar(50)
) AS rows;

SELECT TOP 10000 * FROM catalog_sales;
